plot outline: Kathir (Udhayanidhi) a Madurai lad goes to Coimbatore with a purpose and very soon flips for the charms of a beautiful Pavithra (Nayanthara) who is their neighbor. But Pavithra is already in love with her friend Gautham (Sundar) who is 'not a nice guy'. Kathir who was looking out for his friend at college Mayil (Santhanam) bumps into suddenly and he turns love advisor for Kathir.
title: Idhu Kathirvelan Kadhal
plot: Kathir, who hates marriage, comes to Coimbatore to resolve a family dispute. There, he falls for Pavithra, a neighborhood girl. But, his dream shatters when he finds that she loves her friend.
